title: Dune Q&A
description:
Talking about Dune!

Focusing on the 2021 Dune movie and the first half of Book 1. No big spoilers for the later books, except for some lore details and broad thematic stuff.

Watch on YouTube for the visuals: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_-v_kubD5Xc

The real Dune video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R0krUthYxF4

Podcast chat with Quinn's Ideas: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zG8e-WDw3a4

Get a free audiobook with an Audible Premium Plus trial: http://www.audible.com/asx


ASX Podcast YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWW6C71HUEN5iBuX8qq5xxw?sub_confirmation=1

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/77vubQGd6CsuespWT2Wqa0



Twitter: https://twitter.com/AltShiftX


This was originally livestreamed on the main Alt Shift X YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RzO7AXMDXug

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
